entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Mine Centre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:23 p.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
